Description: Amulet of a uraeus. Erect uraeus, facing left, its tail curled vertically behind it. Flat reverse, moulded obverse. The head and top portion of the body are in opaque yellow glass, the rest of the body and tail in translucent dark-blue glass.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (fig.38, pp.36-37)
